description: Convert text, messages, or arrays of messages into arrays of token numbers using cl200k_base or cl100k_base tokenizers.

inputs.name: input
inputs.description: Text string, Message object with {role, content}, or array of messages to tokenize.

outputs.name: tokens
outputs.description: Array of token numbers representing the input

settings.name: tokenizer
settings.description: The tokenizer to use for tokenization
